name: Mn Services N.V.
goal: MN’s core activities are pension administration, insurance administration, management support, asset management and representation of the interests of our clients. Our products and services allow our clients’ pension members to accumulate and retain a healthy financial position. We put to work the contributions they are required by law to pay, so they have every right to expect honesty and transparency. That is why value creation and continuity take precedence over profit maximization.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs
euInitiatives:
IORP II/III
EMIR
Financial Transaction Tax
MiFID II
EU Benchmark Regulation
Capital Markets Union
Sustainable finance
Pensions
Financial regulation
